mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users ( name, identity_card, phone_number, balance, login_password, status, machine_id, last_on_computer_time, last_off_computer_time ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{identityCard}, #{phoneNumber}, #{balance}, #{loginPassword}, #{status}, #{machineId}, #{lastOnComputerTime}, #{lastOffComputerTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM users WHERE name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR identity_card LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR phone_number LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users WHERE status = #{status}
SELECT id, name, identity_card, phone_number, balance, login_password, status, machine_id, last_on_computer_time, last_off_computer_time, register_time FROM users WHERE id = #{id}
